Text: YOUR KISTLER WINE ORDER IS BEING SHIPPEDTO JEFF SHANKMAN FROM MARK F BIXLER KISTLER VINEYARDS YOUR KISTLER WINE ORDER WILL BE SHIPPED ON OCTOBER YOU SHOULD EXPECT TO RECEIVE IT BETWEEN OCTOBER and NOVEMBER Please contact us preferably by email or fax if you have not received it by NOVEMBER By email By fax at By phone at Your wine is being shipped to JEFF SHANKMAN SMITH ST RD FLOOR HOUSTON TX Phone Number At This Address If for some reason this shipping address is incorrect please let us know It is too late to change the address on the package and will be best if the package can still be received by someone at the address If that is not possible the shipper can be advised of your forwarding address and the shipment can be diverted to that address though this will necessitate extra transit time YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS YOUR FAX NUMBER In Communicating With Us About Your Order Please Refer To SHAN Please do not respond to this email unless your order is late in arriving or there is some other problem
